title: 2017–18 FC Carl Zeiss Jena season
text: The <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20in%20German%20football">2017–18</a> <a href="FC%20Carl%20Zeiss%20Jena">FC Carl Zeiss Jena</a> season is the 115th season in the <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club's history 5th overall season in the <a href="3.%20Liga">3. Liga</a>, the third tier of <a href="German%20football%20league%20system">German football</a>, having been promoted from the <a href="Regionalliga%20Nordost">Regionalliga Nordost</a> in <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20Regionalliga">2017</a>. In addition to the domestic league, Carl Zeiss Jena also participated in this season's edition of the <a href="Thuringian%20Cup">Thuringian Cup</a>, the regional cup for teams in Thuringia. Jena play their matches at the <a href="Ernst-Abbe-Sportfeld">Ernst-Abbe-Sportfeld</a>, located in <a href="Jena">Jena</a>, <a href="Thuringia">Thuringia</a>, Germany. The season covers a period from 1 July 2017 to 30 June 2018.
